text: The Goat Horn (, translit. Koziyat rog) is a 1972 Bulgarian drama movie set in 17th century Bulgaria during the Ottoman Empire. It was directed by Metodi Andonov and stars Anton Gorchev and Katya Paskaleva. == Other websites == * Category:1972 drama movies Category:Bulgarian movies Category:Movies set in the 17th century
title: The Goat Horn
